Articles.Content:
not sure if it is possible

the moons to move on an orbit and do they do in in kerbal based on gravity or set path

my challenge

to find out if it is possible to change a body like minus's orbit using thrust and if so to use engons put minus's orbit into an obvious elliptical orbit around kerban

The planetary orbits in this game are fixed and can't be adjusted by any force acting upon them.

Even if that weren't the case, it would take extremely large amounts of time and fuel to even change anything. This video explains what would be necessary to accomplish it:

It indeed is impossible.

Be sure to be aware of the challenge posting guidelines, and be sure to know if your challenge is possible or not, and to see it's better to try it yourself to show other people it can be done

Thread closed.
